bug.author: GuillaumeDSM
bug.summary: [AdvancedManager] multiple classes addition in advanced classes list
bug.description: error example: 2018-12-24 19:01:55,580 WARNING AdvancedManager More than one instance of <class 'tentacles.Evaluator.Strategies.Default.mixed_strategies_evaluator.FullMixedStrategiesEvaluator'> available, using <class 'tentacles.Evaluator.Strategies.Default.mixed_strategies_evaluator.FullMixedStrategiesEvaluator'>.
